meanings.sent1: The laboring student focused intently on the math problem.
meanings.sent2: She admired the laboring ants carrying food back to their nest.
meanings.sent3: The laboring squirrel tried to lift the acorn but it was too heavy.
meanings.sent4: The laboring machine hummed as it processed the raw materials.
meanings.sent5: The laboring bee tirelessly collected nectar from flower to flower.

meanings.definition: Engaged in hard or physical work
meanings.sent1: The laboring workers toiled under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The laboring farmer plowed the field with his tractor.
meanings.sent3: The laboring dog dug a hole in the backyard searching for buried treasure.
meanings.sent4: The laboring engine strained as the old car climbed the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The laboring blacksmith hammered the red-hot metal into shape.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of effort or strain
meanings.sent1: Her laboring breaths indicated she had been running for a while.
meanings.sent2: The laboring engine made strange noises as it struggled to start.
meanings.sent3: The laboring tree branches creaked in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: His laboring voice cracked under the pressure of the emotional speech.
meanings.sent5: The laboring ship battled against the fierce stormy waves.
